dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Welcome. Now what does your heart say... about what you see of my heart?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Keep the door ajar. The sunbeam... is warm for once.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg:
I wonder if you have dined. Let's see... How about potatoes? They are quite fitting as luncheon.
...Worry not, for they have not sprouted.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg:
I am not quite used to the night... It's thanks to the dark that prevents me from seeing further than my nose.
Thinking of my new colleagues who have perished... this solitude brings me fear that I will soon be consumed by another.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: You wish to hear my thoughts on that man in K Corp. He is no longer a companion or anyone worth mentioning; he is no more than a worm with wretched ideas, humiliating technology with... nay, there is no need to sully my tongue.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
...Does it sometimes occur to you when you see a remarkable thing that you want to share the wonderment with others?
That you would like anyone to experience the same moment when you first saw it.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
I have seen chickens fight. The smaller one was always being pecked on its head.
We have been similar until now... but will that last? It will come to light soon enough.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: It makes a pungent smell, does it not? It strikes your senses so intensely, you might almost fall to the ground... Such a deep and fragrant scent, it is.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: Pray, for what reason do you stare so intently into my face? I see... Were you enraptured for a moment?

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg:
RIght, then. Go back to tending to your business if you insist.
After all, nothing matters more to us than our goals.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg:
Now... Behold. These flowers are in full glory.
Once all these flowers have been stained red... that shall be when 'I' bloom as well.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Press me not. I'll be on my way when I need to.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: ...To the innocent times.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Did you call me?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Let's make it bloom.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: So did they bloom.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Ahh... Dear.

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: They will not be tormenting anyone any longer.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: When... the time comes... I would have to wilt...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Thank you for showing me such a moment.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: ...Let's cover this moment with dirt, shall we.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: The bud has risen. Effort has borne fruit.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: So it has bloomed... I would like to capture this moment somewhere.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: We were simply in fortune's favor until now... It was only the land we tilled that was fertile...
